snippet: First baseman Chris Davis was the winning pitcher, and outfielder Darnell McDonald the loser, as Baltimore outlasted the Red Sox in Boston.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat Boston Red Sox, 9-6, in 17 innings; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: First baseman Chris Davis was the winning pitcher, and outfielder Darnell McDonald the loser, as Baltimore outlasted the Red Sox in Boston.

headline.seo: Nonpitchers Pitch at End as Orioles Prevail in 17
headline.main: Nonpitchers Pitch as Orioles Prevail in 17
headline.print_headline: Nonpitchers Pitch as Orioles Prevail in 17
